      • getPreferredSize

      • setRelativeLocationAndSize

        public void setRelativeLocationAndSize(float XPercent,
                                       float YPercent,
                                       float widthPercent,
                                       float heightPercent,
                                       org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
        This method applies the position and size of the component relatively (in%). If this component has no parent, its position and size are relative to the window(global). Otherwise, if this component has a parent, its position and size are relative to it (local). note: all parameters must be between 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        XPercent - the position of the X coordinate relative to the window or its parent (if any)
        YPercent - the position of the Y coordinate relative to the window or its parent (if any)
        widthPercent - the WIDTH of the component relative to the window or its parent.
        heightPercent - the HEIGHT of the component relative to the window or its parent.
        gc - the game container (the window)

      • setLocationRelative

        public void setLocationRelative(float XPercent,
                                float YPercent,
                                org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
        This method applies the position of the component relatively (in %). If this component has no parent, its position and size are relative to the window(global). Otherwise, if this component has a parent, its position and size are relative to it (local). note: all parameters must be between 0 and 100.
        Parameters:
        XPercent - he position of the X coordinate relative to the window or its parent (if any)
        YPercent - the position of the Y coordinate relative to the window or its parent (if any)
        gc - the game container (the window)

      • centerHorizontally

      • centralize

        public void centralize(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
        Center this component in the center of your parent container, and if not, in the center of the screen.
        Parameters:
        gc - the game container

      • setSizeRelative

        public void setSizeRelative(float widthPercent,
                            float heightPercent,
                            org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
        This method applies the size of the component relatively (in%). If this component has no parent, its position and size are relative to the window(global). Otherwise, if this component has a parent, its position and size are relative to it (local). note: all parameters must be between 0 and 1, or between 1 and 100.
        Parameters:
        widthPercent - the WIDTH of the component relative to the window or its parent.
        heightPercent - the HEIGHT of the component relative to the window or its parent.
        gc - the game container (the window)
